settings.title: DOUGLAS PEREIRA MINERAL MAKEUP RANGE
settings.subtitle: DOUGLAS PEREIRA MINERAL MAKEUP RANGE We believe makeup is an extension of your skincare and they should work in synergy to better your skins health.

settings.title: DOUGLAS PEREIRA SKIN HEALTH
settings.text:
Douglas Pereira Skin Health is a premium collection of result driven products that have been formulated for a skincare savvy user or somebody that wants to elevate their skincare regime and achieve effective, visible, long-term results that will transform their skins health.

The concept behind the collection was to create a luxurious, prescriptive range of products that are scientifically formulated using the most sophisticated and advanced active ingredients.

Each product in the collection is made up of high - potency formulations that contain the vital peptides, antioxidants, vitamins, minerals, and lipids found naturally within the human body, thus being recognised, and optimised by the skin and its functions.

The collection consists of multifaceted formulations, including cleansers, hydrators, essential and targeted serums, and special care products.

Each with their own unique formulation of active ingredients that target problematic skin challenges, promote a resilient, healthy skin barrier, and supports the prevention, intervention, and rejuvenation of the signs of ageing.
